creator: Yonden Media Works Co.,Inc
descriptionHtml:
By using the Media-Gather BroadCaster, you can broadcast live video to PC or smart phone, the voice of the Android smartphone built-in camera, from the microphone.
In addition, in order to use the Media-Gather BroadCaster, you must have (Media-Gather Professional) system is available Video management and distribution platform provided by Media Works, Inc. N read. (It is provided as a service or product)
As broadcasters move, how to live in real time, such as marathon and athletic, and other events take place outdoors is possible.
■ function
Title selection function
You can select from the app (channel), to broadcast live any title registered in advance (Media-Gather Professional) platform video management and distribution.

Broadcasting function
Once connected, the touch of a button is to start broadcasting, you can send (Media-Gather Professional) video camera image management and distribution platforms Android, the microphone, the voice.

Monitoring functions
During the broadcast, you can check the sound level meter level. If the level is low, when disconnected, adjust the quality settings.
After the start of broadcasting, you can monitor from the video delivery application.

• Function to set the quality
For a video camera, you can switch between front and rear camera.
About screen size and delivery rate, 16:9, 4:3 aspect ratio than another preset buttons standard quality, high-quality 16:9, 4:3, 16:9, 4:3 six of the highest quality, you can select You.
For advanced settings, by extension mode, bit rate, screen size, frame rate, etc., can be changed over.
About screen size, you can configure up to full HD minimum, from 160 × 120.
For the camera's white balance, you can press the Settings button, you can adjust.
About MIC, you can select standard quality, from high-quality sound, you can adjust the sensitivity of the microphone body.

※ How to use
A. Before you use the app, video management and distribution platform (Media-Gather Professional)
Log in to, please register a live.
Two. Launch the app, enter the account for the Media-Gather, the server address, please touch the "check button" connection. By checking in to save the connection, you can omit the input from the next.
Three. After a successful login, the screen will appear. Encoder, and then touch the Connect button. Is connected to the distribution server.
Four. By selecting a title name, you can select the channel you want to broadcast.
Five. By the touch of a button (green), you will (red) and start broadcasting the start of broadcasting.
※ broadcast screen will be enlarged with a double touch.
※ If the 3G connection, you may not be able to be delivered live and stable. At the advanced settings, please adjust frame rate and quality.
6. Live broadcast, check on the management and distribution platform video, you can view.
If you want to open to the public, by tagging or public address (URL) of the simplified page delivery,
Please then paste the URL into your web site and public tags.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We improved the function at the first startup.
